ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: De novo assembly Chloroplast of Cenchrus americanus
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: The software MITObim (v. 1.5, Hahn et al. 2013) was used to reconstruct de novo plastid genomes. We used as initial references: Zea mays
